author: Nectar Gan and David Culver, CNN
title: China fights coronavirus with a digital QR code
description: Imagine your daily routine being dependent on a smart phone app. Leaving your home, taking the subway, going to work -- each move, dictated by the color shown on your screen. Green: you're free to proceed. Amber or Red: you're barred from entry.
content: Hong Kong (CNN)Imagine your daily routine being entirely dependent on a smart phone app. Leaving your home, taking the subway, going to work, entering cafes, restaurants and shopping malls -- each move, dictated by the color shown on your screen. Green: you'r… [+10447 chars]
